company: Integrity Pharma Plus Ltd O/A Hazeldean Pharmacy

job_info_group.processed_text: education College university certificate diploma program set Pharmacy drugstore dietitian nutritionist plan supervise fabricate fit ocular prosthesis build modify prosthetic orthotic appliance footwear Supervise direct activity medical technologist technician build prosthetic orthotic appliance accord drawing measurement plaster cast Design fabricate ocular implant Design build fit adjust prosthetic orthotic appliance help scheduling workflow plan menu diet individual group direction dietition nutritionist Assist supervise personnel prepare serve food examine measure patient develop sketch appliance Paint iris pupil artificial eye body limb measurement patient advise patient care prosthesis orthose Bill party insurer compound oral solution ointment cream ensure information prescription accurate enter client information database prepare medication client help patient complete menu maintain inventory medication prescription record pharmaceutical product assist dietitian research food nutrition food service system clean restore ocular prosthesis Interpret physician's specification advise patient loss depth perception modify plaster cast Advise patient care ocular prosthesis repair maintain fabrication laboratory equipment consult ophthalmologist concern insertion ocular prosthesis Supervision people personal suitability accurate efficient interpersonal skill excellent write communication term Permanent Language week

description:
Education: College, CEGEP or other non-university certificate or diploma from a program of 1 year to 2 years 
  Experience: 1 year to less than 2 years 
  Work setting
   Pharmacy or drugstore
   Tasks
   Assist dietitians or nutritionists plan and supervise food service operations
   Design, fabricate and fit ocular prostheses and conformers
   Repair, build and modify prosthetic or orthotic appliances or footwear
   Supervise and direct activities of other medical technologists or technicians
   Assemble or build prosthetic and orthotic appliances according to drawings, measurements and plaster casts
   Design and fabricate ocular implants
   Design, build, fit and adjust prosthetic and orthotic appliances
   Help with scheduling and workflow
   Plan menus and diet for individuals or groups under direction of dietition or nutritionist
   Assist in supervising personnel who prepare and serve food
   Examine and measure patients to develop working sketches of appliances
   Paint the iris and pupil of artificial eyes
   Take body or limb measurements of patients
   Advise patients in the use and care of prostheses and orthoses
   Bill third party insurers
   Compound oral solutions, ointments and creams
   Ensure the information on prescriptions is accurate, enter client information in databases and prepare medications for clients
   Help patients complete menus
   Maintain inventories of medications and prescription records of pharmaceutical products
   Assist dietitians with research in food, nutrition and food service systems
   Clean and restore ocular prostheses
   Interpret physician's specification
   Advise patients on loss of depth perception
   Make and modify plaster casts
   Advise patients on care and use of ocular prostheses
   Repair and maintain fabrication and laboratory equipment
   Consult with ophthalmologists concerning insertion of ocular prostheses
   Supervision
   1 to 2 people
   Personal suitability
   Accurate
   Efficient interpersonal skills
   Excellent written communication 
  Work Term: Permanent 
  Work Language: English 
  Hours: 30 to 40 hours per week
